name: yellow-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Toughness during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Toughness while in a contest.

flavor_text.black-white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the Tough aspect of the holder in a Contest.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the Tough aspect of the holder in a Contest.
